module.name: Unt_iopcc
module.short: First Unit for the International Obfuscated Pascal Coding Contest

element.name: Main
element.short: This is the Main-Procedure

element.name: L
element.short: L gives a short version of Integer

element.name: I
element.short: I is an subset of Integer of 0 to 3

element.name: Z
element.short: Z is a constant of 1 shl 11

element.name: U
element.short: U is a constant of $13 shl 1 +1

element.name: O
element.short: O is a constant of U and -U

element.name: D
element.short: D is a constant of O shl (O shl O + O)

element.name: B
element.short: B is a constat of $597B

element.name: C
element.short: C is a string-constant of ' _|'

element.name: l0
element.short: l0 is a array of L containing (0,-3,U-O,-O)

element.name: lQ
element.short: lQ is an array of L containing (O,U,-O,-U)

element.name: E
element.short: Variable E is an Array of L

element.name: H
element.short: Function H takes L and gives L as result

element.name: H.Q
element.short: Q is the var input parameter of H

element.name: Q
element.short: Procedure Q takes L as parameter Q

element.name: Main.ll
element.short: variable ll is an arary of L

element.name: Main.Hel
element.short: Variable Hel of type L is initialized with 0

element.name: Main.Wor
element.short: Variable Wor of type l is initialized with d-D;

element.name: Main.P
element.short: Variable P is of type L

element.name: Main.A
element.short: Variable A is of type L

element.name: Main.S
element.short: Variable S is of type L

element.name: Main.CA
element.short: Variable CA is of type L

element.name: Main._fe
element.short: Variable _fe is of type L and initialized with z-z

element.name: Main._C
element.short: Variable _C is of type L

element.name: Main.oo
element.short: Variable oo is of type l

element.name: Main.l1
element.short: Variable l1 is an array of type L
